location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 8456/36 'Sirdar Ikbal Ali Shah: particulars of writings, movements, etc. (Inc commutation of pension)'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 63; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file comprises telegrams, despatches, correspondence, memoranda, and notes, relating to the circumstances and arrangements for the pension of Sirdar Ikbal Ali Shah and his request for it to be commuted and paid in a lump sum.

name.namePart: Permanent Under-Secretary of State for India and Burma
